ROOT.QUERY: -- Item with Floating picking mnot authorized and with no picking address SELECT ar_donord WHS, ar_cproin ITEM_CODE, ar_ilogis LV, ar_libpro ITEM_DESC , (SELECT pv_adrpiv FROM tb_pivot@heinens_stk_prod WHERE pv_cproin=ar_cproin AND pv_ilogis=ar_ilogis AND pv_adrpiv IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM=1) PIVOT_ADDRESS, DECODE(ar_pickft, 0, ''IMPOSED'', 1, ''FORBID'', 2, ''AUTHORISED'') PICKING_FLOATING, NVL((SELECT sum(ul_nqteup) FROM TB_EUMS@heinens_stk_prod, TB_LCUMS@heinens_stk_prod WHERE ue_usscc = ul_usscc AND UL_CPROIN=ar_cproin AND UL_ILOGIS=ar_ilogis AND NVL(UE_STAPRE, 0) = 0 -- Only take into account available on hand (not in preparation) AND UE_INDFIC = 1 ),0) INV_CASE FROM tb_art@heinens_stk_prod WHERE ar_pickft=1 -- FORBID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tb_pick@heinens_stk_prod WHERE rp_cproin=ar_cproin AND rp_ilogis=ar_ilogis) AND ar_stprod=0 AND ar_donord = 90061 -- IN (91070, 91071, 90061) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tb_pivot@heinens_stk_prod WHERE pv_cproin=ar_cproin AND pv_ilogis=ar_ilogis AND pv_adrpiv IS NOT NULL) AND NVL((SELECT sum(ul_nqteup) FROM TB_EUMS@heinens_stk_prod, TB_LCUMS@heinens_stk_prod WHERE ue_usscc = ul_usscc AND UL_CPROIN=ar_cproin AND UL_ILOGIS=ar_ilogis AND NVL(UE_STAPRE, 0) = 0 -- Only take into account available on hand (not in preparation) AND UE_INDFIC = 1 ),0) > 0

ROOT.HEADER: Warehouse Warehouse Items with FORBID floating picking
